metadata.name: Service Security Descriptor Tampering Via Sc.EXE
metadata.comment: Detection of sc.exe utility adding a new service with special permission which hides that service.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\sc.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('sc.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sdset')))

output.summary: Detection of sc.exe utility adding a new service with special permission which hides that service.
